thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 4 of 137
thread.title: Kaye B

author: Kaye B
title: Kaye B
text: This was my first experience with DogVacay and my first time leaving our 8 mo-old labradoodle with anyone else. We couldn't have been more pleased. Our sitters were awesome with him, keeping a close eye and showering him with affection. They sent pictures to ease our minds and feel a little less guilty about leaving him. Eric and Megan were wonderful, and I am so glad to have found them!
